body:
Comment 1: 
The 'comma, ok' is a special[-1] construct allowed only in explicitly defined places.
It's a pair but _not_ an ExpressionList and it's thus not eligible for use in the
ReturnStmt.

""""
An index expression on a map a of type map[K]V may be used in an assignment or
initialization of the special form

v, ok = a[x]
v, ok := a[x]
var v, ok = a[x]
where the result of the index expression is a pair of values with types (V, bool). 
""""

  [-1]: http://golang.org/ref/spec#Index_expressions
  [0]: http://golang.org/ref/spec#ExpressionList
  [1]: http://golang.org/ref/spec#ReturnStmt

#WorkingAsIntended
